Item.Value: [Name:Merchants 1][Text:Hello $Name$. I trust this letter finds you well. Hopefully, by the time you read this, you will have done the basic task of setting up a $WorldObject_112$. It wouldn't do at all for our Merchants to arrive and find themselves without a place to trade. According to our records, $Actor_36$ will be arriving on Wednesday, and $Actor_38$ will be arriving on Friday. As with all Merchants, they will be willing to purchase most things from you. However, due to their limited carrying capacity, I suggest you sell them only items that they are actively looking for. $Actor_36$ has a keen eye for monster parts and relics from before the war, while $Actor_38$ is looking for wands and herbs local to your area. May fortune favour you. Yours, Caspian Fortenay, Guild of Merchants][Day:2][Month:1][Year:1][NPCID:69]
[Name:Archive 1][Text:Gratitude for your contributions. I have sent this small reward as recompense, I hope that you appreciate it.][ArchiveTotal:3][Money:100]
